facet_1.name: Thunderhead
facet_1.effects: While Eye of the Storm is active, Storm Surge procs more often and affects all enemy units within in the storm radius. x2 Storm Surge Proc Chance. Additionally reduces the Storm Surge downtime. -2.5s Downtime

facet_2.name: Dynamo
facet_2.effects: Grants bonus spell amplification per current total attack damage.

effects: Creates two eyes within the storm to strike two different units at the same time
When scalding buildings, the jolts of the eye will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient
Now additionally applies a percentage-based movement speed slow corresponding to the attack damage steal value

level_20: -0.1s Eye of the Storm Strike Interval

abilities.name: Unstable Current
abilities.description: Grants movement speed bonus per hero level.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Razor. The innate returns as a powertrain for the Lightning Revenant â€” keeping him between the lines, lanes, and helps him shift between them.

abilities.name: Dynamo
abilities.description: Grants bonus spell amplification per current total attack damage.
abilities.details: Selecting the Dynamo facet unlocks this ability.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Razor's hero model has the following hidden innate abilities. He may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling.
abilities.details: Has hidden innate abilities that require channeling to activate.

ability_1.name: Plasma Field
ability_1.details: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Each enemy unit can be hit twice, once each upon expanding and contracting. The further the distance, the stronger the effect.
ability_1.description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path.

facet_effects.secondary_activation: Now reactivate itself within the Plasma Field upon cast with 0.8 second delay and 0.7 damage factor

technical_details: Has a total 2.2-second expand and contract time
Interrupts Razor's channeling abilities upon cast
Centered on Razor upon cast for the entire duration
Grants a 2.2-second 700-radius flying vision following Razor upon cast
interaction_notes: Both the magical spell damage and movement speed slow component can affect the same enemy units twice
The ring starts 105-distance away from Razor, expands up to the max radius covering a total 805-distance

ability_2.name: Static Link
ability_2.details: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy unit, the enemy unit loses attack damage incrementally while being linked to Razor.
ability_2.description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy unit, the enemy unit loses attack damage incrementally while being linked to Razor.

facet_effects.attack_while_moving: Allows Razor to attack while moving with the link active. Grants Razor bonus attack damage incrementally while being linked to the enemy unit.
facet_effects.talent_upgrade: The link now also transfers attack speed from the target to Razor
facet_effects.shard_upgrade: Now additionally applies a percentage-based movement speed slow corresponding to the attack damage steal value. Increases cast range.

technical_details: Link breaks upon either unit's death or when exceeding 800 break distance
Grants shared vision over the affected enemy
Cannot be recast on the same link-affected enemy unit
interaction_notes: Considers clones, illusions, and creep-heroes as heroes
Eye of the Storm prioritizes damaging link-affected enemy units
Can affect different enemy units simultaneously

ability_3.name: Storm Surge
ability_3.details: When attacked by an enemy, Razor has a chance to release a Forked Lightning that strikes the attacking source, prioritizing the attacker's unit-type.
ability_3.description: When attacked by an enemy, Razor has a chance to release a Forked Lightning that strikes the attacking source, prioritizing the attacker's unit-type.

facet_effects.thunderhead: While Eye of the Storm is active, Storm Surge procs more often (36% chance) and affects all enemy units within storm radius (500). Additionally reduces downtime to 0.5 seconds.
facet_effects.guaranteed_proc: Has an ensured proc chance with a Global proc radius on the enemy source, when affected by an offensive unit-targeted ability on Razor

technical_details: Has a fixed downtime upon proc that cannot be reset with cooldown reset sources
Forked Lightning searches for additional targets centered around the primary target
interaction_notes: Does not proc from building attacks
Spell damage is considered reflection damage, preventing spell lifesteal benefit
Affects fogged and invisible units when procced via offensive abilities

ability_4.name: Eye of the Storm
ability_4.details: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.
ability_4.description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.

facet_effects.thunderhead: While Eye of the Storm is active, Storm Surge procs more often and affects all enemy units within storm radius
facet_effects.scepter_upgrade: Creates two eyes within the storm to strike two different units at the same time, and it may now damage buildings

technical_details: Interrupts Razor's channeling abilities upon cast
Recasting creates another independent Eye of the Storm
Eye of the Storm ends upon Razor's death
While invisible, the Eye of the Storm is still functional and strikes are invisible
interaction_notes: Has strike priorities: Static Link debuffed units first, then lowest current health
Does not affect Roshan, Courier, fogged units, invisible units, ward-type units
Can strike up to max 42/50/60 times per cast

changes: Increased Dynamo outgoing spell damage bonus per 20 attack damage from 1% to 1.25%
Storm Surge spell damage is now considered reflection damage
REWORKED Aghanim's Shard upgrade for Static Link
OLD: No longer pulls Razor and the linked target toward each other at 100 distance per second while active
NEW: Now applies a StackAmount as a percentage-based movement speed slow while active
Talents: LVL 10 +30 Plasma Field damage â†’ +0.75s Plasma Field slow duration
Storm Surge Thunderhead now also reduces downtime from 3 to 2.5 while Eye of the Storm is active
Talents: LVL 15 -1s Storm Surge strike downtime â†’ +12 strength
